channel.title: Problem adding "some" NPC's
channel.description:
The NPC ID's that are already listed in the autospawn.cfg work fine, but if I go to npc.cfg and find an ID there, they won't work and I get an error in the Runserver.bat. (After I compile of course.)
I was wondering if there's something special I have to do, or if it can't be done... I was basically adding some stuff, messing around and I tried to add a Kalphite Queen. So I added it to the autospawn.cfg and put all the info needed, but, it didn't work.

item.title: Problem adding "some" NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

The NPC ID’s that are already listed in the autospawn.cfg work fine, but if I go to npc.cfg and find an ID there, they won’t work and I get an error in the Runserver.bat. (After I compile of course.)

I was wondering if there’s something special I have to do, or if it can’t be done… I was basically adding some stuff, messing around and I tried to add a Kalphite Queen. So I added it to the autospawn.cfg and put all the info needed, but, it didn’t work.

Read full topic
